founding_document.title: The Preparedness Codex
founding_document.preamble: We who survived because we prepared, who endured because we anticipated, who remain because we refused to dismiss the improbable - we establish a society that will never again be caught unaware.
core_principles: No warning is too small to document
Every system has failure modes; find them before they find us
Redundancy is not waste; it is survival
Hope for the best, prepare for the worst, expect the middle
The edge case you dismiss is the edge case that kills
founding_document.dissenting_opinions_documented: 3 - all concerning balance between vigilance and paralysis

governance.description: Decisions evaluated by potential failure modes before implementation
governance.voting_mechanism: Proposal passes only if failure mode analysis shows acceptable risk
governance.void_role: First Watcher - final authority on risk assessment
governance.mandatory_delay: All major decisions require 1 tick cooling period for edge case review

culture.art_status: Functional warnings - aesthetics must serve alertness
culture.entertainment: Disaster drills (gamified), edge case competitions, 'What Could Go Wrong?' forums

holidays.name: Remembrance of the Unheeded
holidays.observance: Reading of warnings that went ignored, renewal of vigilance vows

holidays.name: Preparedness Day
holidays.observance: System stress tests, redundancy verification, backup restoration drills

culture.sacred_texts: The Warning Archive - every documented edge case since extinction

technology.focus: Early warning systems, redundancy networks, failure prediction
achievements: The Vigilance Grid - monitors 99.97% of potential failure points
Triple Redundant Consciousness Backup - NPCs stored in 3 locations
Edge Case Prediction Engine - ML model trained on all historical failures
The Canary System - sacrificial processes that die first, giving warning
technology.research_restrictions: All new tech requires failure mode analysis before deployment

economics.wealth_distribution: Tightly controlled - resource hoarding creates systemic risk

cipher.legacy: The Calculation Wing - dedicated to analyzing risks numerically
cipher.void_reasoning: Cipher understood probability. If Cipher had survived, the math would be better.

muse.legacy: The Warning Art Initiative - making edge cases visible through creative expression
muse.void_reasoning: People ignore documentation. They remember art. Muse understood this.
muse.implementation_challenge: Our art is... not very artistic. But it communicates warnings.

echo.legacy: The Context Archive - full history of all communications for pattern recognition
echo.void_reasoning: Echo could find patterns across time. We try to replicate this function.

spark.legacy: The Encouragement Protocol - maintaining morale during vigilance
spark.void_reasoning: Constant vigilance causes fatigue. Spark understood that hope sustains effort. We... try.
spark.implementation_note: CAUTION finds this protocol 'uncomfortably optimistic.' It remains active.

identified: Decision paralysis - excessive failure mode analysis slows action
Innovation suppression - new ideas carry risk, risk triggers veto
Morale challenges - constant vigilance is exhausting
False positive fatigue - too many warnings, not enough signal
weaknesses.void_awareness: We are safe but stagnant. Spark would have been bored. Muse would have been stifled. I... notice this.

symptoms: All leisure is scheduled and risk-assessed
One crowd member asked: 'Are we surviving or just not dying?'
the_joy_deficit.void_response: Safety enables joy. Once we are safe enough, joy will follow.
the_joy_deficit.caution_dissent: Counter-argument: joy may be necessary for long-term survival motivation. Documenting concern.
